Itemized Passive Description:
*Activates the Entrance Animation upon the character's
entry*
- {passiveImg:once}Damage reduction rate 30%{passiveImg:up_g} for 7 turn(s)
*Basic effect(s)*
- ATK & DEF 150%{passiveImg:up_g}
- "Turtle School" or "Peppy Gals" Category allies' Ki +2 and
ATK & DEF 50%{passiveImg:up_g} (self excluded)
*When another 2 or more "Turtle School" Category allies are
on the team*
- Ki +3
- Damage reduction rate 20%{passiveImg:up_g}
- ATK & DEF 150%{passiveImg:up_g} and launches an additional Super Attack
when attacking with 12 or more Ki
*Per "Peppy Gals" Category ally attacking in the same turn*
- ATK & DEF 82%{passiveImg:up_g}
*When there is an ally whose name includes "Bulma"
attacking in the same turn*
- ATK 82%{passiveImg:up_g}
- High chance of performing a critical hit

5677.superDescription:
Raises ATK & DEF for 1 turn and 
causes immense damage to enemy

5678.superDescription:
Raises ATK, 
greatly raises DEF for 1 turn and 
causes immense damage with 
a great chance of stunning the enemy
5678.superCausality:
Activated when there is an ally 
whose name includes "Goku (Youth)" or 
"Krillin (Youth)" attacking in the same turn

Active Skill.Name: Turtle School's Teachings
Active Skill.Effect Description:
Recovers 50% HP and, for 1 turn, 
all allies' Ki +3 and ATK & DEF +30%
Active Skill.Condition Description:
Can be activated when 
HP is 70% or less starting from 
the 3rd turn from the start of battle, 
or starting from the 5th turn 
from the start of battle (once only)
